Inpher.io | Privacy Preserving Analytics | New York (USA), Lausanne (Switzerland)

Experienced Software Engineers: We are a startup developing a novel technology for privacy preserving analytics. We are seeking high performing individuals that will work on the design and development of our XOR Secret Computingâ„¢ Engine. You should have proven experience with development of large software systems as well as taking responsibility for testing and reviewing code and customer facing roles. You will join a smart, geographically distributed development team.

Other open positions include: -Data Scientists and Machine Learning experts -Applied cryptography engineers, UI/UX designers and developers -Technical Business Development

Send your resume to: careers@inpher.io.
